item.description:
The Scurvy Dog is a new fave for many of us. They have DJs on various nights. Some may characterize this as the local 'punk' or rock-a-billy bar but we all seem to fit in. On the last Wednesday of every month is a great DJ playing old alternative classics (and he takes requests). Trying out this place the night before Thanksgiving, the guy checking IDs at the door was wearing a kilt and the two guys behind the bar were very attentive. The crowd filled up the space comfortably so Astronomer Mike of P-collective and I decided to post this as an event for December for both meetup groups. You might want to wear black but it's not required!

If you are around, and think this could be a place to check out or up your alley, please join in.
item.name: Scurvy Dog - Dec. 30
